price: Na tukamfunulia hukumu hiyo, ya kwamba hata wa mwisho wao hao ikifika asubuhi atakuwa kesha katiliwa mbali.
arabic: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقۡطُوعٞ مُّصۡبِحِينَ
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu Subhanahu wa Taa'la alimfunulia Luut'i kwa kumwambia: Sisi tumewahukumia na kuwakadiria wakosefu kuteketea. Watang'olewa itapoingia asubuhi, wala hatobaki hata mmoja wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqaḍaynā ilayhi dhālika al-amra anna dābira hāulāi maqṭūʿun muṣ'biḥīna
